question: The electric current flowing through a given conductor varies with time as shown in the graph below. The number of free electrons which flow through a given cross-section of the conductor in the time interval <katex>$0\le t\le20s$</katex> is
images/e4d3c2b1-a1b2-4c3d-8e9f-000000000049.png
explanation: Area = Area of trapezoid (0-10s) + Area of rectangle (10-20s).
